SECTION_CONTENT:
OCCUPATIONAL SPILL: Do not touch damaged containers or spilled material. Call
radiation safety personnel for assistance. For small liquid spills, use absorbent pads or other
non-dispersible absorbent materials. Isolate the area to prevent unnecessary access by
nonessential personnel. Enter spill area only to save life; use all practical means to control the
spread of possibly contaminated materials. Uninjured persons and possibly contaminated
equipment and materials should be kept from leaving until monitored by qualified radiation
authority. Cleanup should not be attempted except at the instruction of qualified radiation
authority.
